mapper.select: select * from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno} order by rno desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(bno, replytext, replyer, updatedate) values (#{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer}, now())
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set replytext = #{replytext}, updatedate = now() where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(bno) from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno}
